name: Epic War Saga
summary: Epic War Saga, also known as Epic War MMO, or in the case of the relaunch, EpicWar Saga, is the sixth Epic War Game. Epic War Saga has a large fan base, however, the rating is lower then some of the other Epic Wars due to the energy system. The energy system was eventually removed. Epic War Saga has been anticipated for re-release after popularity shortened from Flash Player's expiration.
